products.name: Canon Rebel T5 18MP DSLR Camera With EF-S 18-55mm IS, EF 75-300mm Lenses & DSLR Bag
products.shortDescription: The Canon EOS Rebel T5 bundle is ideal for families, budding photo enthusiasts and first-time SLR users. The camera offers helpful shooting modes and convenient creative options to make capturing photos and movies straightforward and enjoyable. The powerful 18MP CMOS image sensor and DIGIC 4 image processor produce dazzling images and recordings.

products.name: GoPro HERO Waterproof HD Sports and Helmet Camera - Hero Edition
products.shortDescription: Capture and share all your life's adventures with the GoPro HERO. Shoot crystal clear HD photos and video as you fly through the air on a zipline, dive into the ocean, or bike along a mountain trail. This wearable, gear-mountable, rugged and waterproof camera can go anywhere you can go - and then some.

products.name: GoPro HERO4 Waterproof HD Sports and Helmet Camera - Silver Edition
products.shortDescription: As the first ever GoPro with a built-in touch display, the GoPro HERO4 Silver, lets you capture the world in an all-new way. This camera features professional-quality video and images with 1080p60 and 720p120 video, and 12MP photos at a stunning 30 frames per second, as well as a ton of accessories.

products.name: Sony a5000 20.1MP Mirrorless Camera With 16-50mm, 55-210mm Lenses & Case Bundle - Black
products.shortDescription: Enjoy incredible detail whether taking photos in low light or shooting fast-action videos with the Sony ILCE-5000LBKIT dual lens bundle kit. The pocket-size camera  houses the same APS-C sensor size as a typical DSLR so you can shoot like a pro in any situation. It's also equipped with WiFi and NFC technologies for easy wireless connectivity.

products.name: Nikon D5200 24.1MP DSLR Camera with AF-S DX Zoom-Nikkor 18-55mm & 55-200mm Lenses Kit
products.shortDescription: Never miss another precious moment. The Nikon D5200 DSLR camera captures stunning 24.1MP photos and Full HD video for memories to last a lifetime. It comes with 18-55mm and 55-200mm lenses, so you can snap everything from beautiful portraits to incredible landscapes.

products.name: GoPro HERO4 Waterproof 4K Sports and Helmet Camera - Black Edition
products.shortDescription: The GoPro HERO4 Black, is the most advanced GoPro ever made, so get out there and capture immersive, stunning footage of all your adventures. It features a 2x more powerful processor with 2x faster video frame rates, high-resolution 4K30 and high frame-rate 1080p120 video, and built-in WiFi and Bluetooth connectivity.

products.name: Nikon D3200 24.2MP DSLR Camera with AF-S DX Zoom-Nikkor 18-55mm & 55-200mm Lenses Kit
products.shortDescription: Take your photos and videos to the next level with the Nikon D3200 with 18-55mm and 55-200mm lens kit. This compact camera is packed with features, including a 24.2 MP DX-format CMOS sensor that excels in any light, EXPEED 3 image-processing for fast operation and creative in-camera effects, Full HD movie recording, and much more.

products.name: Canon PowerShot SX700 HS 16.1MP 30X Optical Zoom Digital Camera With Tripod - Black
products.shortDescription: No matter where life takes you, the Canon PowerShot SX700 HS bundle puts you right in the action. With a powerful 30x optical zoom, you can capture subjects a long distance away or track fast-moving children or athletes on the field. It comes equipped with WiFi and NFC technologies for easy wireless connectivity.

products.name: SanDisk 64GB SDXC UHS-I Class 10 Memory Card
products.shortDescription: Take better pictures and Full HD videos with this SanDisk 64GB SDXC UHS-I Class 10 Memory Card. It features an incredibly fast transfer speed, exceptional recording performance and a large 64GB storage capacity. The durable construction is waterproof, temperature poof, X-ray proof and shock-proof.

products.name: Sony HDRAS20 Waterproof/Shockproof Compact POV Action Cam
products.shortDescription: Capture every thrilling detail of your life's adventures using this Sony Action Cam.  Lightweight, waterproof, aerodynamic, and with controls that are easy to use even with gloves on, this camcorder is ideal for use outdoors and strapped to anywhere from your surfboard to your mountain bike helmet. Even when the ride is rocky, your video is smooth.

products.name: Sony Cyber-shot HX50VB Wi-Fi 20.4MP 30X Optical Zoom Digital Camera With 8GB Memory Card - Black
products.shortDescription: Never miss a moment with the Sony HX50VB Cybershot digital camera bundle with 8GB memory card. The camera houses a 20.4MP CMOS image sensor and 30x optical zoom so you can get incredibly close to the action. Even when your hand is shaky, the optical SteadyShot image stabilization ensures your sports, travel or wildlife photos stay crisp and clear.

products.name: Canon EOS Rebel T5 18MP DSLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm, EF-S 55-250mm IS STM Lenses and Tripod Bundle
products.shortDescription: Whether you’re shooting precious moments or beautiful scenery, the Canon EOS Rebel T5 will help you capture your desired subject in movies or photos with high-quality results. The combination of a powerful 18.0 Megapixel CMOS image sensor and the DIGIC 4 image processor provides excellent speed and quality for HD videos and high-resolution photos.

products.name: Fujifilm Instax Mini 8 Instant Camera with Case and Film - Blue
products.shortDescription: If you're trigger happy, you'll love the Fuji Instax Mini 8 camera. It takes vivid photos even in low-lit settings and captures shots in an instant with the electronic shutter. The camera adjusts settings automatically to suit available light whether indoors or outdoors and allows you to manually adjust brightness for a softer effect.

products.name: GoPro HD Hero3+ Waterproof High-Definition Sports & Helmet Camera - Silver Edition
products.shortDescription: Document all your thrilling adventures with GoPro Hero3+ Silver Edition sports camera. Smaller and lighter than its predecessor, this camera can record video in stunning Full HD and take beautiful 10MP snapshots. The waterproof housing makes the camera ideal for virtually any escapade, while built-in WiFi lets you preview video on your smartphone or tablet.

products.name: Canon EOS Rebel T5i 18MP DSLR Camera With 18-135mm Lens & Accessory Kit
products.shortDescription: Great for first time DSLR users and professionals alike, this bundle includes the Canon EOS Rebel T5i with a 18-135mm lens kit for capturing sharp and brilliant photos of all kinds. It also comes with a shock-absorbing LowePro bag for traveling safely with your equipment, and a spare battery pack that lets you shoot for longer without a recharge.

products.name: Fujifilm Instax Mini 8 Instant Camera - White
products.shortDescription: The Fujifilm Instax Mini 8 instant camera makes it fun and easy to snap photos wherever you go. It takes instant credit-card-sized photos that you can share with friends or carry in your wallet. Featuring auto focus, auto flash, a brightness adjustment dial and a Fujinon lens, this camera takes cool, vibrant pictures, even in low lighting.

products.name: SanDisk Extreme 64GB 80MB/s microSDXC Class 10 UHS-1 Memory Card
products.shortDescription: The Sandisk Class 10 Extreme microSDHC memory card is designed for optimal video recording performance. Made specifically for the GoPro Hero 3+ line of action cameras, it's ideal for shooting 3D and Full HD video, it features Class 10 and UHS Speed Class 1 (U1) ratings for faster read/write speeds.

products.name: Canon EOS 70D 20.2MP DSLR Camera with EF24-70mm Lens and Speedlight 320EX Flash
products.shortDescription: Get creative with your compositions and enjoy Full HD video quality with the Canon EOS 70D DSLR bundle. The camera offers continuous shooting at 7fps and nifty functions like quick, high-precision focusing, Live View Creative filters, Multiple Exposure mode, and more. The bundle comes with a 24-70mm lens and Speedlite 320EX flash.

products.name: ReTrack Selfie Stick (ETSELFIE) - Black
products.shortDescription: Perfect your selfies with the ReTrak Bluetooth Selfie Stick. This monopod hoists your device up to 3.3ft above and away from you to get to the perfect distance and angle for your self-portrait, scene capture, or unobstructed shot of the concert stage. An integrated timer gives you time to get your pose ready.

products.name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 340 HS 16MP 12X Optical Zoom Digital Camera With Case - Black
products.shortDescription: Enjoy the flexibility of shooting from anywhere with the Canon PowerShot ELPH 340 HS bundle. Its powerful 12x optical zoom and wide-angle lens allow you to capture wide group, landscape shots or city scenes, or zoom in to the telephoto end for a close-up. It comes equipped with WiFi and NFC technologies for easy wireless connectivity.

products.name: Canon EOS Rebel T5 18MP DSLR Camera With 18-55mm Lens Kit
products.shortDescription: Whether you're a budding photo enthusiast or first-time SLR user, the Canon EOS Rebel T5 18-55 III makes it easy to shoot high-resolution photos and videos in all sorts of situations. This rugged SLR takes the guesswork out of complicated shots, even at low light, and offers creative functions so you can play with unique perspectives.

products.name: Samsung EC-WB35FZBPBCA Wi-Fi 16.2MP 12x Optical Zoom Digital Camera - Black
products.shortDescription: The Samsung EC-WB35FZBPBCA point-and-shoot camera opens your photographic world to exquisite detail. With a 16.2MP sensor and 24mm wide-angle lens, you can get wider shots at closer range. Capture every nuance of your candlelit dinner or a sunset view thanks to an F3.1 feature that lets you shoot sharp images in darker conditions.

products.name: SanDisk Extreme 32GB 80MB/s microSDHC Class 10 UHS-1 Memory Card
products.shortDescription: The Sandisk Class 10 Extreme microSDHC memory card is designed for optimal video recording performance. Made specifically for the GoPro Hero 3+ line of action cameras, it's ideal for shooting 3D and Full HD video, it features Class 10 and UHS Speed Class 1 (U1) ratings for faster read/write speeds.

products.name: Sony 32GB Micro SDHC Class 10 UHS-1 Memory Card (SR32UYA)
products.shortDescription: Carry your music, photos, videos and games with you anywhere. The Sony 32GB microSDHC high-speed memory card is ideal for expanding the storage on your tablet, camera, phone or other mobile device.

products.name: ReTrak Bluetooth Selfie Stick Monopod - Black
products.shortDescription: Perfect your selfies with the ReTrak Bluetooth Selfie Stick. This monopod hoists your device up to 3.3ft above and away from you to get to the perfect distance and angle for your self-portrait or group shot. With a shutter release button on the handle and integrated Bluetooth for instant Instagramming, you'll easily master the selfie.

products.name: Canon PowerShot SX600 HS Wi-Fi 16.0MP 18x Optical Zoom Digital Camera with Mini Tripod & 8GB SD Card
products.shortDescription: The Canon PowerShot SX600 HS Camera is the perfect point-and-shoot to slip in your pocket when you’re traveling light. It features an amazing 18x optical zoom, powerful 16MP CMOS image sensor, a super-slim design, and built-in WiFi to share your favourite images instantly. You can also capture incredible Full HD video to create amazing memories.

products.name: Nikon D610 Wi-Fi 24.3MP DSLR Camera With AF NIKKOR 50mm Lens Kit
products.shortDescription: Whether shooting people, landscapes or close-ups, the Nikon D610 DSLR kit takes your creativity to the next level. With a 24.3MP FX-format CMOS sensor, capture stunning full-frame images and broadcast-quality 1080p Full HD videos. The HD-SLR body is compact and lightweight for easy handling wherever you go.

products.name: Olympus TG-850 Waterproof/Shockproof 16MP 5X Optical Zoom Digital Camera With Case - Black
products.shortDescription: Capture the moment of your outdoor adventures with the Olympus TG-850 digital camera bundle. Waterproof, shockproof, crushproof, and freezeproof in design, the TG-850 can go anywhere from an undersea voyage to a mountain venture. It snaps brilliant 16MP photos and records videos in Full HD so you won't forget the moment.

products.name: Canon HF R50 8GB HD Camcorder, Bag & Extra Battery (9175B073)
products.shortDescription: The compact Canon VIXIA HF R50 makes it easy to connect to friends, family and the world by sharing vivid Full HD video of special occasions and everyday fun. The camcorder's huge 57x Advanced Zoom gets you the shot you want from virtually anywhere, and with the SuperRange Optical Image Stabilizer video is clear and steady.

products.name: Canon PowerShot SX520 16MP 42x Optical Zoom Digital Camera with Tripod, Case and SD Card - Black
products.shortDescription: Capture your world in stunning detail with Canon. From an action-packed hockey game to a beautiful landscape, the PowerShot digital camera can snap crystal-clear images thanks to its 16MP sensor, DIGIC 4+ processor, and wide-angle lens. Hone in on the action with the 42x optical zoom or record movies in Full HD.

products.name: Sony A5000 20.1MP Mirrorless Camera with 16-50mm Lens - Black
products.shortDescription: The Sony A5000 mirrorless camera combines powerful specs and instant connectivity in a compact, take-anywhere design. This interchangeable lens camera boasts a 20.1MP APS-C CMOS sensor, BIONZ image processing, and built-in WiFi and NFC connectivity so you can instantly share your beautiful photos and Full HD videos.

products.name: Sony Cybershot DSCW830B 20.1MP 8X Optical Zoom Digital Camera With Case - Black
products.shortDescription: The Sony DSCW830B Cybershot 20.1MP digital camera is the perfect pocket-sized companion. Wherever you go, you can capture stunning photos and clear HD video thanks to the professional-grade Carl Zeiss lens. With creative modes like toy camera, pop colour, and beauty effects, this camera can transform ordinary photos into the extraordinary.
